Useful for scenarios such as preventing trades until the end of an evaluation period, or having an emergency switch for freezing all token transfers in the event of a large bug. _Available since v3.1._","kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. documentation.text:
@dev ERC1155 token with pausable token transfers, minting and burning.
 Useful for scenarios such as preventing trades until the end of an evaluation
 period, or having an emergency switch for freezing all token transfers in the
 event of a large bug.
 _Available since v3.1._
